mapper.insert: insert into board(bd_title, bd_contents, bd_reg_date, bd_type, bd_me_id, bd_ori_num, bd_del) select #{board.bd_title}, #{board.bd_contents}, now(), #{board.bd_type}, #{board.bd_me_id}, ifnull(max(bd_num),0)+1, 'N' from board;
mapper.select: select * from board where bd_type = #{type} and bd_del = 'N' and bd_title like concat('%',#{cri.search},'%') order by bd_num desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
select * from board where bd_num = #{bd_num} and bd_del = 'N'
mapper.update: update board set bd_del = 'Y', bd_del_date = now() where bd_num = #{bd_num}
mapper.select: select * from file where fi_bd_num = #{bd_num} and (fi_del != 'Y' || fi_del is null)
mapper.update: update file set fi_del = 'Y', fi_del_date = now() where fi_num = #{fi_num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where bd_type = #{type} and bd_del = 'N' and bd_title like concat('%',#{cri.search},'%')
